price: Aku mendapati dia dan kaumnya menyembah matahari, selain Allah dan setan telah menjadikan mereka memandang indah perbuatan-perbuatan mereka, lalu menghalangi mereka dari jalan (Allah) sehingga mereka tidak dapat petunjuk,
arabic: وَجَدتُّهَا وَقَوۡمَهَا يَسۡجُدُونَ لِلشَّمۡسِ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فَصَدَّهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ فَهُمۡ لَا يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wajadttuhā waqawmahā yasjudūna lilshamsi min dūni al-lahi wazayyana lahumu al-shayṭānu aʿmālahum faṣaddahum ʿani al-sabīli fahum lā yahtadūna
